bibl.title: Alexander's Grave between the two Idioms of: s∞ma ka‹ s«ma. <sema kai soma>
Proceedings of the 20th International Congress of Papyrologists
bibl.author: TAWFIK, Zeinab

bibl.note: La tradition historique, ancienne et moderne, est partagée sur le nom donné par Philadelphe à la tombe d'Alexandre: tÚ s«ma ou tÚ s∞ma. Se prononce en faveur de la seconde forme. <to soma, to sema>
bibl.seg: TAWFIK Zeinab, Alexander's Grave between the two Idioms of: s∞ma ka‹ s«ma. <sema kai soma>
Proceedings of the 20th International Congress of Papyrologists (Copenhagen, 1994) pp. 598-599.
